base_description: Gray cabinet with rectangular shape and modern style.
part_description: Includes three upper rectangular compartments and one large lower compartment with a door. Compartments are evenly spaced and aligned horizontally, with the lower section spanning the entire width.
internal_interaction_description: The upper compartments are likely used for storage of smaller items, while the large lower compartment, accessible via a door, can store larger items. The alignment and spacing facilitate organized storage, allowing for easy access and separation of contents.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall in a room, serving as a storage unit. It interacts with users who open the compartments to store or retrieve items. Its modern design complements contemporary interiors, and its size allows it to fit in various spaces.
